channel.title: [pi] rings
channel.description: so i put some work into this and i got the easter ring to work i make the ring of stone work and monkey gree gree but when u equip the ring of stone or monkey gree gree when u un equip it it puts a easter ring in ur inv idk y :confused: i tried making it say ""c.getItems().deleteEquipment(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon], c.playerWeapon);"" instead of ""c.getItems().deleteEquipment(c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing], c.playerRing);"" still didn't work any help?
